mapper.select: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_sub_name, price, product_type, stock, discount_rate, product_detail, amount, calorie, product_storage, store_name, store_tel, thumbnail_image_url, product_sale_status, created_at, updated_at FROM tbl_product
SELECT STOCK FROM tbl_product WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_product SET STOCK = GREATEST(0, STOCK - #{orderCount}) WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
